days.text: Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling significantly. Mainly cloudy. Force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Mainly cloudy. Force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
